DOC.brief_summary: A multicenter , randomize , double-blind , active-controlled , phase III clinical trial evaluate efficacy safety Dp-R206 Bonviva 16 week month improvement vitamin D postmenopausal woman osteoporosis .
DOC.brief_title: Phase III Clinical Trial DP-R206 Bonvia In Postmenopausal Women With Osteoporosis
DOC.criteria: Female 40 year old postmenopausal Subject history malignant cancer
